dateText:
Wea. Mon. Jan. 29, 1894 Ther.
Wayne Co. Lyons
Opera House
Congress Hotel -
Mr & Mrs Eck drove in
3 miles - heavy snow
storm - small but good
audience -
fullText:
Wayne Co. Lyons
Opera House
Congress Hotel -
Mr & Mrs Eck drove in
3 miles - heavy snow
storm - small but good
audience -
summaryText: Susan B. Anthony writes about a small but good audience at the Opera House in Wayne Co. Lyons despite heavy snow storm. She mentions Mr & Mrs Eck driving in.
